discourse_list.title: [Informal Poll] Should we take Emergency action to fix the peg by changing USDC-B vault instead of USDC-A?

content.content: Vault type USDC-B is currently completely useless. I proposed to change its parameter instead of changing the USDC-A parameter.     no change remove the vault decrease the SF to 4% decrease the SF to 6% decrease the SF to 10% decrease the CR to 105% decrease the CR to 103% increase the debt ceiling to 100M increase the debt ceiling to 50M What is it for already?     0 voters
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is proposing a change to the USDC-B vault parameter and is asking for feedback through an informal poll. The post explains the proposal and offers different options for the poll. A 3rd party could give constructive criticism on the proposal.

content.content: I think the purpose of USDC-B is definitely worth discussing. With Liquidations v2 and the ability for liquidity providers to use flash loans, it should maybe be retired. My understanding is this form of extremely short term liquidity was the reason we created the USDC-B vault.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal

content.content: sorry for having hijacking your post. The main idea of having a different vault than the usdc-a to decrease the CR is to have a special vault to collect the bad debt. which is also my main concern about decreasing the CR. As clearly with CR at 103 or 101, lot of people won’t pay it back.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
Author of proposal is asking for feedback

content.content: What I’m saying is I don’t think that’s why the USDC-B vault was created.

There’s still some usefulness to the USDC-B vault. In case the USDC-A vault ever gets filled. Though the CR could get lowered to 105%. Even with a 101% CR on USDC-A and liquidations v2, there could still be times when USDC-A vault gets filled. So that’s one reason to have USDC-B. Not saying we don’t want to tweak some of the parameters. I think 103% is too low for USDC-B, too easy to get filled.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal

content.content: I think you should change this to an informal poll rather than a signal request, since there’s no end date for the poll, and the topic deserves more discussion around the purpose of the USDC-B vault. I will reach out to @LongForWisdom about clarifying the distinctions between these types of posts and signal requests.
